description: 选择器视图组件，不含弹窗，方便使用方灵活定制选择器。

descriptionTags.en: The picker view component, not has contain popup, which is convenient for the user to flexibly customize the picker.
descriptionTags.name: 选择器视图

data.description:
数据源，非级联时data数组的长度决定picker列数，级联时以cols决定 pick列数
@en Data source, the length of the data list determines the number of picker columns when not cascading, and the number of picker columns is determined by cols when cascading
data.name: data

tags.en: Data source, the length of the data list determines the number of picker columns when not cascading, and the number of picker columns is determined by cols when cascading

data.descWithTags: 数据源，非级联时data数组的长度决定picker列数，级联时以cols决定 pick列数

cascade.description:
是否联动
@en Whether to cascade
cascade.name: cascade

tags.en: Whether to cascade

cols.description:
列数(最大为5；cascade=true时才使用)
@en Number of columns (maximum 5; only used when cascade=true)
cols.name: cols

tags.en: Number of columns (maximum 5; only used when cascade=true)

rows.description:
行数(一列可选项的行数)，必须是奇数，最小为3个
@en The number of rows (the number of rows in a column of optional items), must be an odd number, the minimum is 3
rows.name: rows

tags.en: The number of rows (the number of rows in a column of optional items), must be an odd number, the minimum is 3

rows.descWithTags: 行数(一列可选项的行数)，必须是奇数，最小为3个

tags.en: Disabled

value.description:
值, 格式是[value1, value2, value3], 对应数据源的相应级层value
@en Value, the format is [value1, value2, value3], corresponding to the corresponding level value of the data source
value.name: value

tags.en: Value, the format is [value1, value2, value3], corresponding to the corresponding level value of the data source

value.descWithTags: 值, 格式是[value1, value2, value3], 对应数据源的相应级层value

onPickerChange.description:
每列数据选择变化后的回调函数
@en The callback function after each column data selection changes
onPickerChange.name: onPickerChange

tags.en: The callback function after each column data selection changes

onPickerChange.descWithTags: 每列数据选择变化后的回调函数

itemStyle.description:
每列样式
@en Stylesheet per column
itemStyle.name: itemStyle

tags.en: Stylesheet per column
Custom classname

clickable.description:
是否可通过点击操作选择内容
@en Whether content can be selected by clicking
clickable.name: clickable

tags.en: Whether content can be selected by clicking

clickable.descWithTags: 是否可通过点击操作选择内容

hideEmptyCols.description:
是否隐藏无数据的空列，常用于级联选择
@en Whether to hide empty columns without data, often used for cascading selection
hideEmptyCols.name: hideEmptyCols

tags.en: Whether to hide empty columns without data, often used for cascading selection

hideEmptyCols.descWithTags: 是否隐藏无数据的空列，常用于级联选择

touchToStop.description:
是否通过长按停止滑动，传入数字 x 表示触摸超过 x 毫秒算长按，传 true 表示 x=100，长按事件与 click 事件互斥
@en Whether to stop sliding by long-pressing, inputing the number x means that the touch exceeds x milliseconds to count as long-pressing, inputing true means that x=100, the long-press event and the click event are mutually exclusive
touchToStop.name: touchToStop

tags.en: Whether to stop sliding by long-pressing, inputing the number x means that the touch exceeds x milliseconds to count as long-pressing, inputing true means that x=100, the long-press event and the click event are mutually exclusive

touchToStop.descWithTags: 是否通过长按停止滑动，传入数字 x 表示触摸超过 x 毫秒算长按，传 true 表示 x=100，长按事件与 click 事件互斥

value.name: value
value.description:
每一列展示的每项文案对应的值
@en The value for each item displayed in each column

tags.en: The value for each item displayed in each column

value.descWithTags: 每一列展示的每项文案对应的值

label.name: label
label.description:
每一列展示的文案
@en Text displayed in each column

tags.en: Text displayed in each column

children.name: children
children.description:
级联状态下，该列对应的下一列数据
@en In the cascade state, the next column of data corresponding to this column

tags.en: In the cascade state, the next column of data corresponding to this column

children.descWithTags: 级联状态下，该列对应的下一列数据

dom.name: dom
dom.description:
最外层元素 DOM
@en The outermost element DOM

tags.en: The outermost element DOM

getCellMovingStatus.name: getCellMovingStatus
getCellMovingStatus.description:
每一列的滑动状态
@en Sliding state of each column

tags.en: Sliding state of each column

getAllColumnValues.name: getAllColumnValues
getAllColumnValues.description:
获取所有列的值
@en Get all column values

tags.en: Get all column values

getColumnValue.name: getColumnValue
getColumnValue.description:
获取第 n 列的值
@en Get the value of the nth column

tags.en: Get the value of the nth column

getColumnValue.descWithTags: 获取第 n 列的值

updateLayout.name: updateLayout
updateLayout.description:
手动更新元素布局
@en Manually update the element layout

tags.en: Manually update the element layout

resetValue.name: resetValue
resetValue.description:
重置选择器的值为传入的`value`值
@en Reset the selector's value to the input value `value`

tags.en: Reset the selector's value to the input value `value`

resetValue.descWithTags: 重置选择器的值为传入的`value`值

scrollToCurrentIndex.name: scrollToCurrentIndex
scrollToCurrentIndex.description:
直接跳到当前最近一行（调用时将中断滚动）
@en Jump directly to the current most recent line (will break scrolling when called)

tags.en: Jump directly to the current most recent line (will break scrolling when called)

scrollToCurrentIndex.descWithTags: 直接跳到当前最近一行（调用时将中断滚动）
